conbody.p: A completion rule represents the business logic used to complete values of a dataset or class attributes during their creation.

The rule accepts the business entity as input and output parameters. The rule is executed after the business entity instanciation; therefore, initial values set in the Java code can be overridden by the rule.
Only one completion rule can be created for a business entity. This rule covers the attributes that compose the entity. No specific rule is created for a dedicated attribute.
